achievements.title: CSO Reporting Platform Development
achievements.description: Led development team to build comprehensive website for Cambridge City tracking Combined Sewer Overflow problems with modern UI/UX and robust backend infrastructure.

achievements.title: Multilingual & Document Management Implementation
achievements.description: Implemented full multilingual support and built sophisticated document management system for organizing CSO reports and regulatory compliance materials.

achievements.title: Performance & Architecture Optimization
achievements.description: Architected scalable solution using cutting-edge frameworks with advanced caching and responsive design, achieving 40% faster load times.

achievements.title: RESTful API Development
achievements.description: Developed enterprise-grade RESTful APIs for internal applications using Java Spring Boot framework.

achievements.title: Database Performance Optimization
achievements.description: Optimized complex database queries and implemented caching strategies, resulting in 25% faster response times.

achievements.title: Code Quality & Review Process
achievements.description: Implemented automated code review workflows and quality assurance processes, reducing bugs by 30% and improving team collaboration.

achievements.title: Academic Portal Development
achievements.description: Collaborated with professor to develop comprehensive web portal enabling course registration and SA/TA applications using modern web technologies.

achievements.title: Database Architecture & API Design
achievements.description: Designed robust database schemas for course management and application workflows. Developed RESTful APIs for seamless frontend-backend integration.

achievements.title: Application Management Automation
achievements.description: Created automated application review system for SA/TA positions with tracking, notifications, and administrative workflows, reducing processing time by 60%.
